summary: Passionate for technology and new trends in Human Resources, with extensive experience in all aspects related to the development of commercial and logistics skills, performance management, change management and organizational development in multinational corporations in the mass consumer sector. With skills in measurement and analysis, strategy and planning, focus on detail and results. I consider myself a dynamic, enthusiastic, sociable person with a high orientation towards innovation, accustomed to work under pressure, with a great sense of responsibility, creativity and initiative to solve difficult problems with high level of complexity. I see opportunity in difficulty, I enjoy thinking outside the box but I always make decisions with objectivity, focus on business and positive attitude.

profile_positions.description:
• Currently in charge of the Commercial Academy (16 people), Technical Academy (38 people) and
Leadership Academy (65 line managers) with scope in Ecuador, Peru and Honduras.
  • E-Learning implementation with in-house content design and evaluation. Managed through Workday.
  • Administration of Harvard Manage Mentor online platform for development of management skills.
  • Talent acquisition (recruitment and hiring) for key and senior positions.

profile_positions.title: E-Learning design and HR Consultancy

profile_positions.description:
• Reduced the level of accounts receivable and overdue portfolio of the company by 85% during the first 6 months of my administration, leading the proper implementation of an ERP and training the administrative staff in the use of this application.
• Implemented a direct communication channel with current and potential customers through the company's website, thus increasing annual sales by 18%.
• Led the recertification of the company under the ISO 9001: 2015 standard, with which the company will be able to maintain its regular operation to serve clients of multinational companies until 2021.

profile_positions.title: Senior Learning and Development Manager

profile_positions.description:
- SAP Master Trainer for HCM L&D and Career Development in 4 Latam countries. Global L&D Digital
 Champion in Latam (E-Learning & Virtual Classrooms); participated in governance and implementation of global competencies through SAP/HCM for Sales, Marketing, Finance and HR, as an input for IDPs and build coverage.
- Led the implementation of E-Learning in Ecuador (2013), Colombia, Panama and Peru in 2014; won an “Innovation” Award in a corporate recognition program in 2016. Over 90 courses developed and completed in 3 years for +3.700 participants in Ecuador.
profile_positions.title: Digital Learning Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Training needs analysis, planning and budget for +400 CN employees and +1500 logistic operators personnel. Permanent focus on adoption of desired behaviors.
- Curricula definition for 12 key positions in agreement with Distribution VP & Directors
- Training methodology planning based on audience needs (70-20-10 On-Boarding)
- ROI assessments when needed (e.g. $21K volume increase in Deliveries OTIF from Route Planning program and $7.4K full-product return reduction from Warehousing program)
profile_positions.title: Distribution Academy Manager

profile_positions.description:
- Led the training and development strategy to implement Salesforce and new SAP release for Sales, Finance, Supply Chain and Distribution, ensuring knowledge management
- Over 700 people trained across the country, in over 20 cities simultaneously, managing a team of 23 trainers, with positive feedback (Avg: 4.5/5) and outstanding knowledge results (Avg: 93/100). Communication with regional and global stakeholders and local Excom.
profile_positions.title: Training Team Lead

profile_positions.description:

- Build sound learning solutions: Support regional and country's operations with the creation of a learning catalogue for functional and leadership skills as well as On-Boarding for new employees and new line managers considering a variety of learning methodologies i.e. Classroom training, e-learning, coaching, on-the-job training.
- "Line Managers Academy" overall management (i.e. course planning, vendor management, logistics, budget, communications, reports) and open courses sourcing for all employees of the company.
